DATA.LIVE_TEXT: Remember, as is tradition across the galaxy, the war is officially halted until tomorrow!
Take your time to see your family and friends! Who knows if they'll still be around next week!
Hey, contractor, can you work the Post Office today? There's no one else delivering.
Yeah, everyone's on vacation. Yeah, you'll get paid extra.
Oh, actually... Uh, I think there's someone else also there? They don't have a box, though.
Yeah, check that out, please. Thank you.
